com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.fragments

Class FragmentOne

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.fragments.FragmentOne
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.support.wearable.view.WearableListView.ClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class FragmentOne
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements android.support.wearable.view.WearableListView.ClickListener
    Fragment containing a listView which shows the list of all available sensors.
